Class AppTheme

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.ui.styles.AppTheme
public final class AppTheme extends Object
Provides centralized, immutable theme tokens for the application UI, including dimensions, colors, and fonts. This class is a constant holder and cannot be instantiated.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    AppTheme.AccentCheckBoxIcon
    Minimal accent-colored checkbox icon used to override the default OS check style.

  • Method Details

    • applyAccentDefaults

      public static void applyAccentDefaults()
      Applies global Swing defaults to remove the default OS blue accent in common components. This method should be invoked on the Event Dispatch Thread (EDT) before creating components.

    • flatComboUI

      public static ComboBoxUI flatComboUI()
      Provides a flat JComboBox UI with a neutral arrow and no bright accent color. Intended to be applied as: combo.setUI(AppTheme.flatComboUI());
      Returns:
      a ComboBoxUI instance with a flat arrow button and themed colors
